## README

This is the repository for the assignment of Harry Buckley in the module C7018 - 
Statistical Analysis for Data Science. This is in accordance with the requirements 
to gain a Masters degree in Data Science for Global Agriculture.

Can a prediction be made for which team will win the game after 10 minutes of play time, and which variable(s) heavily influence the outcome: an example using League of Legends?
